${modID}:AppleADayPower.NAME: Apple a Day
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yHealthiness. If you have #b%d or more #yHealthiness, add #b%d #yLollipop%s into your hand instead.

${modID}:AppleADayPlusPower.NAME: Apple a Day+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yHealthiness. If you have #b%d or more #yHealthiness, add #b%d #yLollipop%s into your hand instead.

${modID}:JerryRigPower.NAME: Jerry Rig
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card, find #b%d #yJunk.

${modID}:GarbageCollectorPower2.NAME: Garbage Collector
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yJunk you play each turn is played twice.
The first #b%d #yJunk you play each turn are played twice.

${modID}:AtPeacePower.NAME: At Peace
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yHealthiness and #b%d #yPeaceful.

${modID}:Slice1Power.NAME: Wished for Peace
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, gain #b%d #yPeaceful.

${modID}:Slice2Power.NAME: Wished for Health
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, gain #b%d #yHealthiness.

${modID}:Slice3Power.NAME: Wished for Wealth
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, gain #b%d Gold.
